text: Kya unka kehna yeh hai ke Rasool ne isey khud ghadh (fabricated) liya hai? Inse kaho “ agar maine isey khud ghadh (fabricated) liya hai to tum mujhey khuda ki pakad se kuch bhi na bacha sakogey. Jo baatein tum banate ho Allah unko khoob jaanta hai, mere aur tumhare darmiyaan wahi gawahi dene ke liye kaafi hai, aur woh bada darguzar karne wala aur Raheem hai”
